data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during GRAMPUS cruise from Spithead to Madeira started at 1784-02-10

Ship: Grampus (4th Rate Frigate), Voyage: Spithead - Madeira, 1st Observer: Edward Thompson (Captain), 2nd Observer: Alexander Kirkwood (2nd Officer/Lieutenant), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 50G 1062BM LENGTH 148FT BEAM 40FT 6IN DEPTH 17FT 9IN COMPLEMENT 350. BUILt IN 1782 IN LIVERPOOL, BROKEN UP IN 1794. ONE OF THE FIRST TO BE LAUNCHED WITH A COPPER-SHEATHED HULL.
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
